mainText:
To Steve's family, friends, and colleagues,


It deeply saddens me to hear of Steve's passing. He was an inspiration for me and all of us in the tech industry. His was a bright example of what can be done by those who do not accept the status quo. 

I know there is nothing that can be done to bring him back, but please let me know if there is any way I can help to make his passing any more bearable. Steve will forever be fondly remembered by me!
author: Bart
